About.paragraph: We are working together to elevate Africa's e-Health by educating Africans and offering e-Health services from some of the best doctors in Africa.

How.title: Aceess BOH site
How.text: Using your device browse to the Bank of Health website.

How.title: Browse to services
How.text: Find the appropriate service for your illness or needed advise.

How.title: Contact a doctor
How.text: Found the appropriate doctor contacts and contact them.

How.title: Consultation
How.text: Wait for the scheduled time, the doctor should reach out to you.
